source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a scenery shot of a vast and desolate industrial wasteland or ship-breaking yard. Enormous, decaying metal structures and skeletal frameworks are shrouded in thick, green-tinged fog. The ground is a chaotic mess of scrap and rubble, contributing to the bleak, post-apocalyptic atmosphere.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.

Enormous, decaying metal structures and skeletal frameworks are shrouded in thick, green-tinged fog.
